name: Ratu Sir Kamisese Mara
description: Founding Prime Minister and President of Fiji who led the nation to independence and established its modern democratic institutions
philosophy: Unity in diversity is not just a motto for Fiji, it is a way of life that we must nurture and protect.
quotes: Fiji belongs to all Fijians, regardless of race or creed
The Pacific is our home, and we must work together as Pacific peoples
